attributes.exampleValue: Paste your full private cert here
attributes.name: PrivateKey

attributes.exampleValue: Paste your full leaf and intermediate public certs here
attributes.name: PublicKey

scripts.preScript:
#remove 32 bit version of xmlsec1
if rpm -qa | grep xmlsec1 | grep i686; then yum remove xmlsec1 -y; yum install open-vm-tools -y; fi
# weird multilib problem where 32bit old version of libpng is installed
# yum remove libpng-1.5.13-7.el7_2.i686 -y
yum remove c-ares -y

manageCommands.stopCommand: export PATH=$PATH:/sbin && service logstash stop;service logstash force-stop
manageCommands.name: logstash

scripts.preScript:
echo "*** START hacks -> installation -> pre-script ***"
set -x

logstash_rel_version=$(rpm --queryformat "%{VERSION}-%{RELEASE}" -q logstash-agent-all)

if [ $logstash_rel_version == "2.2.2-1" ]
then
     yum remove logstash-agent-all -y
else
    echo "Uninstall of logstashagent is not required"
fi
